sentences.sContent: They also claim that the security team elbowed aside a steward .
sentences.sContent_eng: They also claim that the security team elbowed aside a steward .
sentences.sCn: 他们还声称保安人员将一位乘务员推搡至一边。

synos.tran: 管家；乘务员；膳务员；工会管事

words.tran: 女管家；女干事；女服务员
管理工作；管事人的职位及职责

trans.tranOther: a man whose job is to serve food and drinks to passengers on a plane or ship
